price: 16. Soki alingi, akolimwisa bino mpe akoya na bikelamu ya sika, (bato)
arabic: إِن يَشَأۡ يُذۡهِبۡكُمۡ وَيَأۡتِ بِخَلۡقٖ جَدِيدٖ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: in yasha yudh'hib'kum wayati bikhalqin jadīdin
